attributes.action: to enforce the law on MP's in the same manner as on other citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I Mr John Bowden hereby petition the government to enforce our countries laws on fraud, obtaining money by false pretences and Tax evasion (payment in kind) on MP’s who have recently resigned or offered to stand down before the next general election or may do so in the future.  Further more, when convicted, their terminal grant and pension rights should be removed.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
